name: Keen Rose Sandals - Women's
description: Charming, feminine footwear you can wear in the backcountry without stopping at streams. Washable uppers and anti-microbial linings and footbeds keep them fresh and rosey through the long haul.Uppers are synthetic and polyester webbing.Hook-and-loop closures adjust for a snug, comfortable fit.Hydrophobic mesh linings are treated with Aegis microbe shield.Midsoles have metatomical EVA footbeds to cradle your feet.Outsoles are non-marking rubber with multi-directional lugs for traction at any angle.
